short_summary: Supply and delivery of 1 new edgebanding machine and additional equipment under the specification by the end of Feb 2024
duration_in_months: Yes, 11 months will be available for the performance of the contract. No Early termination of the contract before the expiry date.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Edgebanding Machine

**Announcement Details**

* **Tender Title**: 21C51-237698 Edgebanding Machine
* **Procurement Reference**: WS4110571980-Doc4120064573
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4110571980
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 26, 2024, 14:00 EST (NEW: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 7, 2024, at 14:00 EST.)

**Procurement Information**

* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (Lease)
* **Region of Delivery**: Winnipeg
* **Selling Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Location**: Place du Portage, Phase III, 11 Laurier St, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Bid File Information**

* **Bid File Type**: Request for Proposals (RFP)
* **Description of Goods or Services**: Supply, delivery, installation, and training for one (1) new edgebanding machine, and removal and disposal of the current machine (Holz Her Contriga 1368) as detailed within.
* **Trade and Ownership Agreements**: The government of Canada is bound by the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Eligibility**

* All eligible bidders may participate in the bidding process.

**Queries and Submissions**

* All inquiries should be directed to the contact below.
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Jared Popp, PSPC/SPAC
	+ Email: jared.popp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone Number: N/A

**Link to documents**
[Post your document here:](https://discovery.ariba.com
